dcterms:creator: S. Yuan
Q. Ye
G. Garcia-Hernando
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: The Hands 2017 challenge dataset is composed of 957032 depth images of five different hands, with a test set consisting of 295510 depth images. It is the largest and most diverse dataset available for hand pose estimation.
dcterms:title: Hands 2017 challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Tompson
M. Stein
Y. Lecun
K. Perlin
dcterms:description: The NYU dataset contains 72,757 training images of a single subject's hand and 8,252 test images that include a second hand shape. It annotates 36 joints, which is relevant for hand pose estimation.
dcterms:title: NYU dataset
